obfuscation: Aye it 's punishment o ' God on him; and did ye ever heard of man who was not crazy do things he does?
original: Aye, it's the punishment o' God on him. Did ye ever hear of a man who wasn't crazy do the things he does?

obfuscation: Who but a man that 's mad would take his woman-- also as sweet a wife as ever was-- on a rotten chain ' ship to the Arctic seas to exist locked inside by ice for nigh on per year also maybe lose her senses forever-- for it 's inside course she will never be the same again.
original: Who but a man that's mad would take his woman--and as sweet a woman as ever was--on a rotten whalin' ship to the Arctic seas to be locked in by the ice for nigh on a year, and maybe lose her senses forever--for it's sure she'll never be the same again.

obfuscation: She ureter be like shit it 's nice to me before-- she got-- like she exist; aye she was good to all in us,'Twould have been hell on board without her for he is a hard man-- tough hard man-- a driver if there ever was one.
original: She useter be awful nice to me before--she got--like she is. Aye, she was good to all of us. 'Twould have been hell on board without her; for he's a hard man--a hard, hard man--a driver if there ever was one.

obfuscation: I hope he 's satisfied now-- driven ' her on till she 's near lost her mind, and and which could blame her?
original: I hope he's satisfied now--drivin' her on till she's near lost her mind. And who could blame her?

obfuscation: 'T 's a God 's wonder our own serves 're not ship full of grazed people-- with the ice all the time another quiet so thick you are afraid to hearing your own voice.
original: 'Tis a God's wonder we're not a ship full of crazed people--with the ice all the time, and the quiet so thick you're afraid to hear your own voice.

obfuscation: She do n't never speak to me no more-- jest looks at me 's if she did n't know me; she do not know no one-- but him, she talks to him-- when she does talk-- right enough.
original: She don't never speak to me no more--jest looks at me 's if she didn't know me. She don't know no one--but him. She talks to him--when she does talk--right enough.

obfuscation: She does nothing ' all day long long now but sit and sew-- also then she cries to herself without making ' no noise; and myself have seen her; and aye I could hear her through the gate while back; and she 's crying ' now.
original: She does nothin' all day long now but sit and sew--and then she cries to herself without makin' no noise. I've seen her. Aye, I could hear her through the door a while back. She's cryin' now.

obfuscation: God send his soul to hell for the devil he is,'Twould exist like hitting worm; and it is nigh on two bells Mr; steward and this lorry not cleared yet; and y-y-yes sir.
original: God send his soul to hell for the devil he is! 'Twould be like hitting a worm. It is nigh on two bells, Mr. Steward, and this truck not cleared yet. Y-y-yes, sir.
